237.sentence: finally , i reiterate my thumbs-down rating for t-mobile as a carrier .

238.sentence: their network coverage is very sporadic , and the network always seems overloaded , resulting in very unpleasant calling experience .

239.sentence: the nokia 6610 is a relatively new phone , and what a great phone it is .

240.sentence: after using it , i found the size to be perfect for carrying in a pocket .

241.sentence: it is just a tad small to hold to your ear with your shoulder , but that is solved with the very comfortable handsfree ear-piece which is included .

242.sentence: unfortunately , the 6610 does not offer voice dialing like my previous phone , but the other features it packs outweighs this shortcoming .

243.sentence: when i turned the phone on , the first thing that hit me is how good the screen is .

244.sentence: the resolution is very good and the colors are bright and even changeable !

245.sentence: the ringtones included are awesome , and did i mention they were polyphonic ?

246.sentence: you can also assign special rings and graphics to special people when they call .

247.sentence: the phone also sports an image gallery ( with option camera attachment ) , a calendar / organizer , alarm clock with snooze , fm radio ( way cool , even if it is just through an ear-peice ) , games , java applications and gprs high-speed internet connection .

248.sentence: the gprs connection is sometimes slow , and writing instant messages with the included aol instant messenger software is a pain , but the other t-zones applications are quite useful .

249.sentence: one downside : as of this writing , t-mobile has n't updated their t-zone system to fully support the 6610 .

250.sentence: all my questions or problems have been quickly and satisfactorily resolved .

251.sentence: the rate plans are also very good , at least for me .

252.sentence: this phone is highly recommended otherwise .

253.sentence: nokia makes a great phone , that 's clear .

254.sentence: with all its complicated features , the menus are easily accessible and the quality of the features is great .

255.sentence: the one huge disappointment is that the phones manufactured for t-mobile lack many of the menus and functions that a nokia straight from the manufacturer should have .

256.sentence: the internet functions of the phone - wap and gprs - will only work through t-mobile 's services , because they have deleted the menu options that would enable you to configure the phone to be used on a different network .

257.sentence: this phone is good with a huge array of features built into it .

258.sentence: the design is sleek and the color screen has good resolution .

259.sentence: it is very light weight and has a good signal strength .

260.sentence: however , the main problem that i think is the with the sound quality .

261.sentence: when talking the voice is not very clear .

262.sentence: but , i would definately recommend this phone .

264.sentence: this is one of the nicest phones nokia has made .
